Name: Sweet Te Deums (Madonna of the Evening Flowers)
Notes: It is a declaration of love to a woman working in the garden.
Long Description: Sweet Te Deums (Madonna of the Evening Flowers) for soprano, baritone, and piano, with text by Amy Lowell. It is a declaration of love to a woman working in the garden.
Short Description: A vocal piece for soprano, baritone, and piano, with text by Amy Lowell, expressing love for a woman in her garden.
